name: Satoru Gojo
title: The Strongest Sorcerer
lore: Satoru Gojo is the strongest jujutsu sorcerer in the world. He wields the Six Eyes and the Limitless technique, allowing him to manipulate space at an atomic level. His domain, Infinite Void, overloads the target's mind with infinite information, rendering them catatonic.

name: Ryomen Sukuna
title: King of Curses
lore: Ryomen Sukuna is a legendary curse from the Golden Age of Jujutsu. Even in death, his power is so great that his 20 indestructible fingers are classified as special-grade cursed objects. His domain, Malevolent Shrine, is unique in that it does not create a barrier, allowing him to slash anything within a 200m radius.

name: Yuji Itadori
title: The Vessel
lore: Yuji Itadori is a student at Tokyo Jujutsu High and the vessel for Ryomen Sukuna. Possessing superhuman physical strength, he is a natural fighter. He specializes in close-quarters combat and has a talent for using Black Flash.

name: Megumi Fushiguro
title: Ten Shadows User
lore: Megumi Fushiguro is a grade 2 sorcerer and a descendant of the Zenin family. He uses shadows to summon shikigami like Divine Dogs, Nue, and Mahoraga.

name: Nobara Kugisaki
title: Straw Doll User
lore: Nobara Kugisaki is a brash and confident sorcerer who uses a hammer and nails infused with cursed energy. Her Resonance ability allows her to damage opponents by striking a detached part of their body.

name: Maki Zenin
title: The War God
lore: Maki Zenin was born without cursed energy in exchange for immense physical prowess. She wields cursed tools with expert proficiency and aims to become the head of the Zenin clan.

name: Kento Nanami
title: 7:3 Sorcerer
lore: Kento Nanami is a Grade 1 sorcerer who left Jujutsu High to become a salaryman before returning. His Ratio Technique allows him to forcibly create a weak point on any target by dividing it along a 7:3 ratio.
